Disclaimer for VictoryBet Offline Bookmaker Office Welcome to the VictoryBet offline bookmaker office website! We are committed to providing our visitors with the most exciting and rewarding gambling experience. However, it is important to note that all activities related to gambling, including sports betting, are intended for individuals over the age of 18. By accessing and using our website, you acknowledge and accept the following disclaimer: 1. Gambling involves risks. You may lose money while gambling on our website. We encourage all of our visitors to gamble responsibly and seek help if they feel that they may have a gambling problem. 2. The information provided on our website, including odds, scores, and results, is for informational and entertainment purposes only. While we strive to ensure that the information is accurate and up-to-date, we make no warranties or representations regarding its accuracy or timeliness. 3. Sports betting is illegal in certain jurisdictions. It is your responsibility to ensure that sports betting is legal in your jurisdiction before using our website. We do not accept users from jurisdictions where sports betting is illegal. 4. We do not tolerate any form of cheating, fraud, or manipulation of our betting platform. Any attempts to manipulate the system, including the use of bots or other automated tools, will result in immediate account suspension and forfeiture of any winnings. 5. We reserve the right to refuse service to any individual at any time, for any reason. We may also limit or restrict access to certain features or services based on your location, age, or other factors. 6. Any personal information that you provide to us will be used solely for the purpose of providing you with our services. We will not sell or share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law. 7. We may modify or suspend our services at any time, without notice, for any reason. This includes changes to our betting rules, odds, and payout structures. 8. We are not responsible for any losses or damages incurred as a result of using our website, including but not limited to, loss of profits, data, or goodwill. 9. We are not liable for any errors or omissions in the information provided on our website, including but not limited to, incorrect odds or scores. 10. Any disputes arising from the use of our website will be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is registered. 11. We support responsible gambling and encourage our users to seek help if they feel that they may have a gambling problem. There are many resources available to help individuals who struggle with gambling addiction, including online forums, support groups, and professional counseling services. If you have any questions, please contact us at VictoryBet@gmail.com Adress: st. Privacy Policy for VictoryBet Offline Bookmaking Company Introduction At VictoryBet, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our customers' personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information when you use our offline bookmaking services. By using our services, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information in accordance with this policy. Information We Collect When you use our offline bookmaking services, we may collect the following information: Personal contact information, such as your name, address, telephone number, and email address; Financial information, such as your bank account number or credit card information, if necessary to process your payments; Betting history and transaction information, such as the dates, times, and amounts of your bets, as well as the sports and events on which you bet; How We Use Your Information We use your personal information for the following purposes: To provide and maintain our offline bookmaking services; To process your payments and transactions; To verify your identity and prevent fraud; How We Share Your Information We may share your personal information with third parties in the following circumstances: With service providers and partners who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processors, data analytics providers, and marketing partners; In response to a court order, subpoena, or other legal process; In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide you with our services and to comply with our legal obligations. We may also retain and use your information as necessary to resolve disputes, enforce our agreements, and protect our rights. Security We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your personal information. If you have any questions, please contact us at VictoryBet@gmail.com Adress: st. Sovetskaya 83, Brest, Brest region 224000, Belarus Telephone: +375 801 100 9999 Email: VictoryBet@gmail.com Terms and Conditions Privacy Policy Disclaimer

Accept About Us Categories Services Contact Welcome to VictoryBet - Terms and Conditions At VictoryBet, we provide a top-tier offline betting experience with a wide range of sports betting options, competitive odds, and professional support. Our secure and friendly environment ensures a thrilling and rewarding experience for all our customers. Join VictoryBet today and bet with confidence. Terms and Conditions Sure, I can create a 'Terms and Conditions' block for an offline betting company called 'VictoryBet'. Here it is: Introduction Welcome to VictoryBet, an offline betting company that provides a wide range of sports and events for betting. By using our services, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. Eligibility To use our services, you must be at least 18 years old and legally able to enter into a binding contract. We may refuse to offer our services to anyone who does not meet these criteria. Account Registration To place a bet, you must register for an account with us. During the registration process, you will be required to provide certain personal information, including your name, address, and contact details. You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information and to update it as necessary. Account Security You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for restricting access to your computer. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. If you have reason to believe that your account or password has been compromised, you must contact us immediately. Placing Bets You can place bets in person at our offline locations. To place a bet, you must provide the relevant information, including the selection, the amount of the stake, and the type of bet. You will receive a bet receipt, which you should keep as proof of your bet. Once a bet has been placed, it cannot be cancelled or changed. Bet Acceptance We reserve the right to refuse any bet without giving a reason. If we accept your bet, it will be confirmed on your bet receipt. If there is a mistake on your receipt, you should contact us immediately. Odds and Payouts The odds for each selection are determined by us, and we reserve the right to change them at any time up until the acceptance of your bet. The payouts for winning bets are calculated based on the odds in place at the time the bet was accepted. Settlement of Bets Bets will be settled in accordance with the official result of the event or selection. If the result is subject to a dispute, we may delay settlement until the dispute has been resolved. Our decision in such cases will be final and binding. Contacts If you have any questions, please contact us at VictoryBet@gmail.com Adress: st. Sovetskaya 83, Brest, Brest region 224000, Belarus Telephone: +375 801 100 9999 Email: VictoryBet@gmail.com Terms and Conditions Privacy Policy Disclaimer
